title: Fake Speech on PM Modi Attributed to Infosys’ Narayana Murthy
subtitle: Fact Check: A viral message on social media claims that Infosys co-founder Narayana Murthy delivered a speech on Narendra Modi. However, the speech has been falsely attributed to Narayana Murthy.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral speech on Prime Minister Narendra Modi that is attributed to Infosys co-founder NR Narayana Murthy reads:

I don't say Modi is the best, but its the first time I know my country is so well recognised out side India.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time 20k Indians gathered in for a politicians speech on a foreign land.

I don't say Modi is the best but for the first time in 46 minutes fantastic speech in USA parlament P.M. of India got 9 times standing ovation, 27 times affectionate clappings out of which 1st clappings lasted for 3 minutes & 40 seconds, which is 1st time in USA's History.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time every NRI is proud of him.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time 80 countries are listening to Indian PM.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time when Pakistan is totally exposed & and China is clueless.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time USA knows that if they need to continue as super power they need Indian support.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time Obama realised, he is not the most famous politician.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time INDIA seems like well recognised a leading country.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time, The World Knows WHY WE ARE THE WORLDS LARGEST DEMOCRACY.

I don't say Modi is the best PM, but its the first time I know I AM A PROUD INDIAN’
